attributes.action: More Train in Devon and Cornwall
attributes.additional_details:
More money needs to be spent on train travel in Devon and Cornwall as more and more people are using the trains but there are not enough carriages.
Money is alway spent in London and the south east but never the south west . Put Devon and Cornwall trains back on the map .

rejection.details: A call for more money to be spent on railway services in Devon and Cornwall is too vague - is the petition calling for more track and stations to be constructed?  Or is it calling for increased services on existing routes?
